forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 83, with temperatures falling to around 81 in the afternoon. East northeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 57. North northeast wind 1 to 5 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 2 to 7 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. Northeast wind 3 to 8 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
